hero.headline: Split Rail Fence Installation
hero.description: Classic American split rail fencing. Perfect for defining property boundaries with rustic charm. Great for large lots, horse properties, and country-style homes.

intro.headline: Why Choose Split Rail?
intro.content: Split rail fencing offers a classic, rustic look that's perfect for country properties, horse farms, and large residential lots. It defines boundaries without blocking views or making your property feel enclosed.
intro.content2: An economical way to mark property lines across large areas while adding curb appeal.
benefits: Can add wire mesh for pets
